news_header: TikTok's future in the US is uncertain, leading many to sideload the app due to restrictions from Apple and Google. Users are turning to third-party sites and VPNs to access TikTok, with significant increases in downloads reported.
news_original_title: Unofficial TikTok downloads surge in the US
news_text: Experts suggest enforcing a ban would be challenging. While downloading TikTok is not illegal, distributing it is, but enforcement has been lax. Companies facilitating sideloading operate in a legal gray area, and despite risks, users continue to find ways to access the app.
